data.title: Kia America achieves record sales with 69,002 units sold in October, up 8% from the previous year, setting new records.
data.description: In October, Kia America achieved a new milestone by selling 69,002 units, setting a new monthly sales record. Sales through Kia retailers also reached a new October year-to-date record, marking an 8% increase compared to the previous year. The Carnival, Sportage, and K5 models had their best-ever October performances. This achievement was announced on November 1, 2025, from Kia's headquarters in Irvine, California.

data.title: Hong Kong saw a 17% drop in negative equity mortgage loans in Q3 2025, as reported by the Monetary Authority.
data.description: In the third quarter of 2025, there was a notable 17% drop in the amount of residential mortgage loans in Hong Kong that were in negative equity, as disclosed by the Hong Kong Monetary Authority.

data.title: HKMA to hold tender for 3-year RMB HKSAR Institutional Govt Bonds on Nov 6, 2025, with RMB1.0 billion up for grabs.
data.description: On November 6, 2025, the Hong Kong Monetary Authority will be launching a tender for the re-opening of 3-year RMB HKSAR Institutional Government Bonds, with an offering of RMB1.0 billion.
New colleague joins the team, bringing fresh perspectives and energy. Welcome to our workplace!

data.title: Fed Governor justifies push for significant rate reductions due to low inflation concerns. Economy at risk without swift interest rate cuts. Full interview available.
data.description: During an extensive interview, Stephen I. Miran expressed his belief that concerns regarding inflation are exaggerated. Miran also expressed his concerns about the economy in case the Federal Reserve does not promptly decrease interest rates. The interview covered various aspects in detail.

data.title: Get ready for A.C.A. health coverage enrollment starting Nov. 1. Stay informed on rising prices with our guide.
data.description: On November 1, enrollment for Affordable Care Act (A.C.A.) health coverage will open, featuring significant price increases. Amidst an impasse in Congress over tax credits, individuals can utilize a guide to select a suitable plan. Be ready for the enrollment period with crucial information on the price hikes to make informed decisions.

data.title: "Best VA Company for 2025: Wing Assistant named top by Expert Consumers after evaluation of remote support providers."
data.description: In a recent announcement on November 1, 2025, Expert Consumers named Wing Assistant the top Virtual Assistant Company of the year. This acknowledgment came after a thorough assessment of various remote support providers. Wing Assistant's well-organized management approach stood out among its competitors, solidifying its position as the industry leader for 2025.

data.title: Remittances play a crucial role in supporting families and economies globally, says CEO Rashid Ashraf.
data.description: On November 1, 2025, it was reported that remittances play a crucial role beyond financial transfers, acting as vital support systems for families, education funding, and the growth of small businesses globally. Expatriates based in the UK and Europe rely on these remittances for various purposes, making millions of transactions every day to sustain their loved ones and contribute to the economic landscape.

data.title: Central bank risks recession if rates aren't cut quickly, warned Stephen Miran, new Board member. Colleagues overly concerned about inflation.
data.description: Stephen I. Miran, the recent addition to the Board of Governors at the central bank, believes that some of his colleagues are overly concerned about inflation.

data.title: E.P.A. reverses decision to terminate Energy Star program amid backlash from business leaders and Republicans.
data.description: The organization has received criticism from corporate executives and members of the Republican party for their proposal to terminate a widely-used energy conservation initiative.

data.title: Medicare recipients urged to review 2026 drug plans. Premium hikes up to $50/month for some Part D plans, others reducing. Enroll now!
data.description: Enrollment for fall is currently ongoing. There are some proposed changes to Part D premiums, with certain plans increasing them by over $50 monthly, while others are considering reducing the costs.

data.title: LUNGevity Foundation focused on Lung Cancer Awareness Month 2025, aims to drive research and early detection, emphasizing progress and future challenges.
data.description: In November, LUNGevity is highlighting advancements and ongoing efforts to transform the outlook for lung cancer. In WASHINGTON on Nov. 1, 2025, LUNGevity Foundation is spearheading Lung Cancer Awareness Month (LCAM) nationwide.

data.title: In September 2025, mortgage applications in Hong Kong fell by 1.1%, but approved loans increased by 9.4% to HK$31.4 billion.
data.description: In September 2025, there was a 1.1% decline in mortgage applications reported by the Hong Kong Monetary Authority. However, approved loans saw a notable increase of 9.4%, reaching HK$31.4 billion during the same period.

data.title: NEAR Protocol reduces inflation rate to 2.4% after failed vote, shedding light on blockchain governance hurdles.
data.description: The most recent update by NEAR Protocol has resulted in a reduction of its token inflation rate to 2.4%, which is significantly lower than the previous rate. This adjustment was made despite a community vote that did not pass, showcasing the difficulties faced in governance within the blockchain space.

data.title: Canary Capital plans to launch XRP ETF on November 13 after SEC update. Approval depends on Nasdaq 8-A review.
data.description: The Canary Capital Group plans to introduce an XRP Exchange-Traded Fund (ETF) on November 13 after submitting a revised filing to the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). The approval of the ETF is dependent on Nasdaq's review of Form 8-A.

data.title: Zero fees for stablecoin swaps available to 65M users at Revolut, facilitating free conversion between USDT and USDC, boosting revenue.
data.description: Revolut has recently announced that they are eliminating fees for swapping stablecoins, allowing their massive user base of 65 million individuals to convert between USDT and USDC at no cost. This move has already led to a notable increase in revenue for the company.

data.title: BTC and ETH ETFs see ongoing outflows amidst market pressures, while mid-cap crypto ETFs gain momentum. (Article)
data.description: ETFs tracking Bitcoin and Ethereum have seen continuous outflows amid ongoing market weakness. In contrast, mid-cap crypto ETFs have been gaining popularity with new listings. This trend is reflected in the net outflows of $X million from Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs, while mid-cap crypto ETFs have seen an influx of investments with new listings attracting attention.

data.title: Criticism mounts in India over crypto tax laws, said to hinder innovation & push users to offshore platforms. Join the conversation on challenges faced by the country's growing crypto community.
data.description: Criticism from India's cryptocurrency investors is on the rise as they argue that the country's tax regulations are hindering innovation and pushing users towards overseas platforms. The community is speaking out against the restrictive tax laws that they feel are limiting their growth. These concerns are being echoed by a significant number of crypto enthusiasts in India, who believe that the current tax policies are having a negative impact on the industry. To delve deeper into the challenges faced by India's rapidly growing crypto community, further exploration is encouraged.

data.title: Hakeem Jeffries and Chuck Schumer criticize Trump's White House bathroom renovation, stating millions face quadruple health insurance premiums.
data.description: President Trump faced criticism from House Minority Leader Hakeem Jeffries and Senate Majority Leader Chuck Schumer for focusing on renovating a White House bathroom while many Americans are anticipating significant increases in health insurance premiums. Jeffries expressed concern about millions facing double, triple, or even quadruple premiums due to the Republican shutdown, labeling Trump's decision to redecorate as inappropriate. Schumer also condemned Trump's priorities, stating that he cares more about bathroom renovations than the healthcare burden on Americans. The tweet shared by Jeffries highlighted the disparities in attention to health insurance issues and bathroom renovations. The news article sheds light on Democrats' disapproval of Trump's actions amidst impending healthcare challenges for the public.

data.title: FTX denies bankruptcy rumors, FTT token surges. Sam Bankman-Fried's post disputes claim, leading to temporary rise in token value.
data.description: A recent social media update by Sam Bankman-Fried on his account X stated that FTX was never financially insolvent. This announcement led to a brief increase in the value of the FTT token. This development attracted attention due to significant movement in the token's price.
